content:
export const sec = sec => sec * 1000
export const min = min => min * 60000
export const hour = hour => hour * 3.6e+6
export const day = day => day * 8.64e+7
export const week = week => week * 6.048e+8
export const month = month => month * 2.628e+9

stablecoin support

set to true for a pegged coin

content: export const or = (a, b) => a ? a : b;

content:
# core

[![standard-readme compliant](https://img.shields.io/badge/standard--readme-OK-green.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/RichardLitt/standard-readme)
TODO: Put more badges here.

Leofcoin core (daemon, api and apiServer)

TODO: Fill out this long description.

## Table of Contents

- [Install](#install)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Maintainers](#maintainers)
- [Contributing](#contributing)
- [License](#license)

## Install

### module
```sh
npm i --save @leafocin/core
```

### cli
```sh
npm i -g --save @leafocin/core
```

## Usage

### module
```js
import { core, api } from '@leofcoin/core'
```

### cli
```sh
leofcoin help
```

## Maintainers

[@vandeurenglenn](https://github.com/vandeurenglenn)

## Contributing

PRs accepted.

Small note: If editing the README, please conform to the [standard-readme](https://github.com/RichardLitt/standard-readme) specification.

## License

MIT  2020 Vandeuren Glenn
